title: Coronation Street spoilers: Emma Brooker dies after sudden collapse?
text:
Emma Brooker (Alexandra Mardell) has had a lot to deal with in Coronation Street this past year —between the death of her dad to discovering that her real father is none other than Steve McDonald (Simon Gregson) — but could the young woman be set to lose her life after she suddenly collapses?

In the coming episodes, Emma shows up for work, but she’s not feeling too great — as she has a pain in her side. As a result, Maria (Samia Longchambon) asks Ali (James Burrows) if he’d take a look at her, but — what with him having just discovered that Maria’s arranged to go on a date with Gary (Mikey North) — he proves unhelpful, and informs Emma that she’s more than likely got food poisoning.

Still feeling unwell, Emma heads home and gets into bed.

However, things take a turn for Emma and — later — Maria and Gary find her lying unconscious on the floor of the flat. They proceed to call an ambulance.

Advertisement

Advertisement

At the hospital, the doctors inform Steve that Emma has a ruptured appendix and will need an emergency operation.

Will Emma pull through?

When Steve learns that Ali did little to help, he’s fuming, and — with emotions running high — he accuses the doctor of medical negligence.

One to watch: Friday 1st November at 8:30pm on ITV.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Emma's been through a lot this year — but could she be set to lose her life as well?
